title: TimeSlicedSurveyResponseMessage
description:
TimeSlicedSurveyResponseMessage is an XDR Struct defines as:

```text struct TimeSlicedSurveyResponseMessage { SurveyResponseMessage response; uint32 nonce; }; ```

EncryptedBody.description:
EncryptedBody is an XDR Typedef defines as:

```text typedef opaque EncryptedBody<64000>; ```

SurveyMessageCommandType.description:
SurveyMessageCommandType is an XDR Enum defines as:

```text enum SurveyMessageCommandType { TIME_SLICED_SURVEY_TOPOLOGY = 1 }; ```

SurveyResponseMessage.description:
SurveyResponseMessage is an XDR Struct defines as:

```text struct SurveyResponseMessage { NodeID surveyorPeerID; NodeID surveyedPeerID; uint32 ledgerNum; SurveyMessageCommandType commandType; EncryptedBody encryptedBody; }; ```
